name: Blizzard Strayer
description:
When a character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Cryo Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Cryo Dice.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

storytext: "...Then please, live on. Do not accompany us unto our doom â€” to languish forgotten in the snow."
